title: Move certification quick-access cards to top of Dashboard, Certification Selector, and Study Materials pages

requirements.summary: Move 8 CompTIA certification cards to the top of the Dashboard page, directly below the header and before the 'Your Certifications' heading
acceptanceCriteria: The 8 certification cards (A+, Security+, Network+, Linux+, Cloud+, CySA+, PenTest+, CASP+) are the first visible content on the Dashboard page, directly below the header.
Each card displays: difficulty badge, exam code, certification name, brief description, latest test score or 'No tests taken yet', and Study/Flashcards/Test icon buttons.
The 'Your Certifications' heading and any stats/progress content that was previously above the cards remains intact but is now positioned below the certification card grid.
The 4-column grid layout, card styles, and all navigation links on the cards are preserved and functional.

file_operations.description: Restructure the component JSX layout to render the certification cards grid as the first content section immediately after the Layout component's header, before the 'Your Certifications' heading and any other dashboard content. Preserve all existing card rendering logic, styles (dark cards, amber/blue accents, difficulty badges), test score display, and quick-access icon button navigation. Ensure the 4-column grid layout (grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4) remains intact. Do not modify any card content, data fetching, or interactive functionality.

requirements.summary: Move 8 CompTIA certification cards to the top of the Certification Selector page, directly below the header and before any descriptive content
acceptanceCriteria: The 8 certification selector cards are the first visible content on the Certification Selector page, directly below the header.
Each card retains its difficulty badge, exam code, name, description, and Study/Flashcards/Test action buttons.
All descriptive text, domain overviews, and any non-interactive informational sections appear below the card grid.
Existing card styles, grid layout, and navigation behavior are unchanged.

file_operations.description: Restructure the component JSX layout to render the certification selector cards grid as the first content section immediately after the Layout component's header. Move any introductory text, domain detail sections, or descriptive informational content to appear below the card grid. Preserve all existing card rendering logic including difficulty badges, exam codes, certification names, descriptions, domain previews, and Study/Flashcards/Test navigation buttons. Maintain the existing grid layout and card styles. Do not modify card content, navigation links, or interactive functionality.

requirements.summary: Move 8 CompTIA certification study material cards to the top of the Study Materials page, directly below the header
acceptanceCriteria: The 8 certification study material cards are the first visible content on the Study Materials page, directly below the header.
Each card retains its certification name, exam code, available guide listings, open/download actions, reading progress bar, and '% read' label.
Any page-level introductory text or secondary informational content is positioned below the card grid.
Existing card styles, grid layout, PDFViewer open behavior, and reading progress functionality are unchanged.

file_operations.description: Restructure the component JSX layout to render the study material certification cards grid as the first content section immediately after the Layout component's header. Move any page-level introductory text or secondary informational content to appear below the card grid. Preserve all existing card rendering logic including certification names, exam codes, study guide listings, open/download actions, reading progress bars, percentage read labels, and PDFViewer integration. Maintain the existing grid layout and card styles. Do not modify reading progress tracking, PDFViewer functionality, or any backend query invalidation logic.
